features.additionalInfo: You can tap and pay for your morning coffee or insert your card to get cash out when you're paying for groceries.

Use instore, online and withdraw local currency at millions of locations, everywhere Mastercard is accepted. Choose a Debit Mastercard with your CommBank account and pay for things using your card, smartphone or wearable.
Get faster payments between participating banks, anytime with a PayID.
See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank or on the go in the CommBank app.
Use Cardless Cash in the CommBank app to get money out without having to use your card.
Securely lock your debit card in the CommBank app when you need to. And unlock it again when you don't.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Pay with your Apple(TM) device using Apple Pay.
Pay with your Android(TM) phone using the CommBank app.
Pay with your Fitbit(TM) smartwatch using Fitbit Pay.
Pay with your Garmin(TM) smartwatch using Garmin Pay.
Pay with your Android(TM) device using Google Pay.
Pay with your Samsung(TM) device using Samsung Pay.
We help you stay on track with your debit and credit card spending in the CommBank app.
Turn Transaction Notifications on in the CommBank app and we'll instantly alert you when you pay using your CommBank debit card, and when you receive money into your everyday account.
Manage payments from your bank account using PayTo.
Unlimited CommBank electronic and assisted transactions.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Streamline Basic is available to anyone with one of the following Commonwealth of Australia concession cards: Commonwealth Seniors Health card; Pensioner Concession card; Health Care card. You also need to make sure your government pension or payments are paid into this account.
You must have an Australian residential address.
Don't already have a Streamline Basic account in the same account name.

fees.name: Unpaid cheque or debit fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we dishonour a cheque or debit presented to us because there isn't enough money in your account.

fees.name: Transaction listing or ad-hoc paper statement fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for paper copies of your transaction listing, past statements or ordered statements.

fees.name: Stop payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you ask us to stop payment of a cheque.

fees.name: Unpaid scheduled payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you don't have enough money in your account for a payment or transfer you scheduled - we try to make the payment or transfer on five successive business days before charging you. This does not include Scheduled Payments that you arrange between your individual and/or joint accounts.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is no charge for additional paper statements issued outside the standard cycle (six months).

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee - Standard Cycle
fees.additionalInfo: There is no charge for paper statements issued within our standard cycle (six months).

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas ATMs
fees.additionalInfo: When you take money out at ASB ATMs in NZ or CommBank ATMs outside Australia.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas cash withdrawals
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawals overseas will incur a $5.00 fee plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas cash withdrawals
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawals overseas will incur a $5.00 fee plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas purchases
fees.additionalInfo: Purchases made overseas or in Australia (e.g. online), where the merchant is located overseas or the financial institution or entity processing transaction is located overseas.

fees.name: CBA ATM cash withdrawals in Australia
Cheque negotiated fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you write a cheque that needs to be negotiated through the clearing system.

data.name: Streamline Basic
data.description: An everyday bank account for health care or pensioner concession card holders.
